item.title: Mobile Device Attack Vectors
item.description: Mobile apps usually involves a three tier architecture. The mobile app, the API backend, and its associated database. We will be mainly concerned with attacks on the client side. Mobile device threats Application data at rest Application data in transit Vulnerabilities in code Data leaks in the app Platform specific issues Threats at the backend Authentication/Authorization Session management Input validation Improper error handling Weak cryptography Attacks on the database OWASP provides guidelines for testing and securing mobile apps.
